settings.title: We’re revolutionising the decorating industry with higher quality products at a lower cost, while striving to eliminate paint waste.
An estimated 415 million litres of paint are generated in the USA and UK every year. Only 2% of this is recycled. The other 98%? It goes straight to landfill. How can this be?
Our Vision of the Paint Industry

settings.text: We understand how important it is finding the right product, so whether you're a business or a first time painter, We've made the best possible product finder to find the right product.

settings.heading: Why settle for mediocre or expensive paints when you can have Paint Outlet?
settings.text: Take a look at the comparison table to see how our platform outshines buying paint elsewhere

settings.heading: Excessive Waste & c02
settings.text: Did you know that 415 million liters of paint are wasted each year, which only 2% is recycled, leading to huge paint wasted to landfill & the production. unnecessary carbon emissions ?  This happens because big manufacturers with large supply chains prioritise profit over the environment, flooding the market with subpar products.

settings.heading: Unreliable products flood
settings.text: The dominance of large manufacturers means limited choices for consumers.  You're left forced to pick either lower-quality, affordable options or pricey brands. Even If you choose premium products. it's difficult to trust how well products are produced. And often lack transparency, With so many misleading labels claiming "special features”.

settings.heading: Stuck in a false economy
settings.text: This never ending cycle creates a false paint economy upon short shelf life product, forcing paint buyer to repaint more frequently. This ultimately causes more paint to be produced in the world. Resulting in higher carbon dioxide emissions and more paint waste in landfills.
